org.hibernate.search.indexes.spi

Interface IndexManagerSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexShardingStrategyIndexManagerSelector, NotShardedIndexManagerSelector

    public interface IndexManagerSelector
    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<IndexManager> all()
      Ask for all shards (eg to optimize)
      Set<IndexManager> forExisting(IndexedTypeIdentifier typeId, Serializable id, String idInString) 
      Set<IndexManager> forFilters(FullTextFilterImplementor[] fullTextFilters) 
      IndexManager forNew(IndexedTypeIdentifier typeId, Serializable id, String idInString, Document document) 

    • Method Detail

      • all

        Set<IndexManager> all()
        Ask for all shards (eg to optimize)
        Returns:
        all the IndexManager for all shards

      • forNew

        IndexManager forNew(IndexedTypeIdentifier typeId,
                    Serializable id,
                    String idInString,
                    Document document)
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the entity
        id - the id in object form
        idInString - the id as transformed by the used TwoWayStringBridge
        document - the document to index
        Returns:
        the IndexManager where the given entity will be indexed

      • forExisting

        Set<IndexManager> forExisting(IndexedTypeIdentifier typeId,
                              Serializable id,
                              String idInString)
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the existing entity
        id - the id in object form
        idInString - the id as transformed by the used TwoWayStringBridge
        Returns:
        If id and idInString are non-null, the IndexManager(s) where the given entity is stored. If they are null, all the IndexManager(s) where an entity of the given type is stored.

      • forFilters

        Set<IndexManager> forFilters(FullTextFilterImplementor[] fullTextFilters)
        Parameters:
        fullTextFilters - the filters applied to the query; must be empty if no filter is applied
        Returns:
        the set of IndexManager(s) where the entities matching the filters are stored
